changeSet.author: mstead
changeSet.comment: Cleans up stray ueber consumers, subscriptions, products and content that gets left around due to BZ#####. The fix for this BZ prevents the data from becoming stray, but does not address a situation where the stray data already exists as reported by BZ 1354633. Cleaning up the stray records will allow for a clean debug cert to be created without error.
